notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: Data files are available from the Long Term Ecological Research Network (LTERN) Data Portal, URL www.ltern.org.au/knb. The persistent URL for this dataset is: Lindenmayer D of Fenner School of Environment and Society, The Australian National University, MacGregor C of The Australian National University, and Director of National Parks (Parks Australia). Jervis Bay Booderee National Park Plot Network: site-level plot data collected during an assessment of the ecological and cost effectiveness of invasive plant management in achieving conservation goals: a long-term experimental study, 2014. ltern2.291 ( http://www.ltern.org.au/knb/metacat/ltern2.291/html). Researchers interested in obtaining the data need only register with the LTERN Data Portal and make a request. This approach to data publication allows the authors to monitor and report on who is wishing to use their data and why. This information is shared with the Wreck Bay Indigenous Community, on whose land the study was conducted. The Community is an Associated Party of the data and the authors report to its Board. The LTERN Data Portal can be contacted by email at ltern@anu.edu.au or by calling Claire deLacey on +612 61251869.
